language.entry: Quick! The thieves are on the run, but they couldn't have gone far.
Quick! The thieves are on the run, but they couldn't have gone far.
Be careful - Despite the looks, they're actually the bad guys.
{?hero_names}%s couldn't catch up to the fleeing thieves.
{?hero_names}%s have successfully caught up to and apprehended the thieves.
Under the cover of the night, and with the costumes to fool the denizens of the hamlet, thieves have stolen all the toys from the hamlet's children. Go after them and reclaim what is ours!
With the thieves banished from our lands, the people of hamlet can sleep sound again. As a gift of appreciation, hamlet's craftsmen decided to open a workshop, and let you do the honors!
%s went on to chase the scummy outlaws.
please message snorlaxxo#5067 on discord if you see this in-game
Might produce a gift at the end of the week.
Share it with your enemies, and you'll be rewarded
{colour_start|yellow}Reality Bending:{colour_end}On attack, will end user's turn. Most likely.
{colour_start|riposte} Antler of Justice:{colour_end} Low chance to make baddies disappear
{colour_start|blue}Playful Spirit:{colour_end} On Friendly Skill: Might lick target
{colour_start|red}Sniffing Expert:{colour_end}Increases scout chance by a lot
+15%% max hp if Citrine in inventory, otherwise -10%% max HP
+12%% Dodge if Jade in inventory, otherwise -8%% Dodge
+4 SPD if Onyx in inventory, otherwise -2 SPD
+30%% DMG if Emerald in inventory, otherwise -15%% DMG
+12%% ACC if Sapphire in inventory, otherwise -4%% ACC
+9%% CRIT if Ruby in inventory, otherwise -3%% CRIT
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}Effects apply only once on AoE skills{colour_end}

快点！那些小偷正在逃跑，但他们还没走远。
快点！那些小偷正在逃跑，但他们还没走远。
小心点-毕竟他们看起来就不是啥好家伙。
{?hero_names}%s 成功地抓住并逮捕了小偷。
在黑夜的掩护下，那些小偷用戏服成功的愚弄了哈姆雷特的居民们，他们拿走了孩子们的玩具。追上他们！拿回我们的东西！
那些小偷被驱逐出我们的土地，现在哈姆雷特的居民们又能安然入睡了。出于感激，哈姆雷特的工匠们开一个小作坊，为你打造荣誉之物！
%s 继续追捕着那些卑鄙的不法分子。
如果你在游戏中看到这个，请在snorlaxxo#5067留言
就算是圣诞节也要有的偷窃精神
可能会在周末送出的礼物。
分享给敌人吧，你会得到回报的
{colour_start|yellow}现实扭曲:{colour_end}攻击时会结束使用者的回合，有很大的概率。
{colour_start|riposte}正义鹿角:{colour_end} 小概率使敌人消失
{colour_start|blue}游戏精神:{colour_end} 友军技能：可以舔一下（？）目标
{colour_start|red}嗅探专家:{colour_end}大幅度增加侦查概率
+15%% 最大生命如果背包里有黄水晶, 否则 -10%% 最大生命
+12%% 闪避倍率如果背包里有翡翠, 否则 -8%% 闪避倍率
+4 速度如果背包里有玛瑙, 否则 -2 速度
+30%% 伤害如果背包里有绿宝石, 否则 -15%% 伤害
+12%% 精准倍率如果蓝宝石在背包内，否则 -4%% 精准倍率
+9%% 暴击率如果红宝石在背包内，否则 -3%% CRIT
+2 速度如果处于队伍首位
+15%% 伤害如果处于队伍末位
{colour_start|skill_unselectable}对范围攻击技能仅有一次效果{colour_end}
